etc.aloe
Class Aloe

java.lang.Object
  etc.aloe.Aloe
Direct Known Subclasses:
AloeInteractive, AloeLabel, AloeSingle, AloeTrain
public abstract class Aloe
extends java.lang.Object

Main Aloe controller superclass. Provides many useful IO methods used by the subcontrollers.
